mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coach(name, phone, description, stadiumId, createDate, updateDate, organization, orgDate, validDate, status, privateClassStatus, teamClassStatus) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{description}, #{stadiumId}, NOW(), NOW(), #{organization}, #{orgDate}, #{validDate}, #{status}, #{privateClassStatus}, #{teamClassStatus})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM coach WHERE 1=1
AND name LIKE #{key}

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.phone, c.description, c.stadiumId, c.createDate, c.updateDate, c.coachImgId, c.organization, c.orgDate, c.validDate, c.status, c.privateClassStatus, c.teamClassStatus s.name as stadiumName FROM coach c LEFT JOIN stadium s on c.stadiumId=s.id WHERE 1=1
AND c.name LIKE #{key}

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.phone, c.description, c.stadiumId, c.createDate, c.updateDate, c.coachImgId, c.organization, c.orgDate, c.validDate, c.status, c.privateClassStatus, c.teamClassStatus s.name as stadiumName FROM coach c LEFT JOIN stadium s on c.stadiumId=s.id WHERE c.id=#{id}

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.phone, c.description, c.stadiumId, c.createDate, c.updateDate, c.coachImgId, c.organization, c.orgDate, c.validDate, c.status, c.privateClassStatus, c.teamClassStatus, s.name as stadiumName, i.url as coachImgPath FROM coach c LEFT JOIN stadium s ON c.stadiumId=s.id LEFT JOIN img i ON c.coachImgId WHERE c.status='1' AND c.stadiumId=#{stadiumId}
